mapper.select: SELECT USER_SEQ AS userSeq, USER_ID AS userid, NAME AS name, PASSWORD AS password, EMAIL AS email, TO_CHAR(BIRTH_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS birthDate, ROLE AS role, ACCOUNT_STATUS AS accountStatus, NOTIFICATION_OPT_IN AS notificationOptIn, TO_CHAR(SIGNUP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS signupDate FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{userid}
